channel.title: Whonix Gateway and two Windows Machines
channel.description:
Hi,
Iam using Whonix Gateway in Virtualbox. The main machine has Linux Debian. Now I routed all traffic from a Windows 7 machine through Whonix which works fine. But when I start the clone machine at the same time I cannot route both through the Whonix Gateway silmutaniously! I can only route the first I start through Whonix Gateway. It doesnt matter if its the original one or the clone. I alreade change the Mac Adress. The clone is a full clone no dependat clone.
Can anyone help me why the second Windows I start cannot got through the Whonix Gateway at the same time like the other?
Thanks!

item.title: Whonix Gateway and two Windows Machines
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Additional workstations need a different IP. Documented here, please have a look:

Whonix – 11 Apr 20

Multiple Whonix-Workstation ™

Compartmentalization. Better separation of different tasks and/or pseudonyms by using multiple Whonix-Workstation ™.

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix Gateway and two Windows Machines

item.title: Whonix Gateway and two Windows Machines
item.dc:creator: Josefnona
item.description:
Hi,

Iam using Whonix Gateway in Virtualbox. The main machine has Linux Debian. Now I routed all traffic from a Windows 7 machine through Whonix which works fine.
But when I start the clone machine at the same time I cannot route both through the Whonix Gateway silmutaniously! I can only route the first I start through Whonix Gateway. It doesnt matter if its the original one or the clone. I alreade change the Mac Adress. The clone is a full clone no dependat clone.

Can anyone help me why the second Windows I start cannot got through the Whonix Gateway at the same time like the other?

Thanks!

Read full topic
